      • encryptWithPassphrase

        public SerializedSecretsV1 encryptWithPassphrase(Context ctx,
                                                 char[] x_passphrase,
                                                 byte[] x_plaintext,
                                                 int pbkdf2_iter_count)
                                          throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Derives an encryption key from x_passphrase, then uses this derived key to encrypt x_plaintext. The resulting cipher text, plus meta data (version, salt, iv, @see SerializedSecretsV1) is serialized and returned.
        Parameters:
        ctx -
        x_passphrase - the passphrase used to PBE on plaintext to NOT WIPED
        x_plaintext - the plaintext to encrypt NOT WIPED
        Returns:
        instance of SerializedSecretsV1
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException

        Returns:
